name: Andromeda Character Controller (Prototype)
description:
First release of the player character controller prototype for Andromeda. 

At this point player can : 

  • Move (all direction) 
  • Jump (with multi jumps) 
  • Crouch
  • Shoot (using raycast shot)
  • Aim
  • Switch weapon (between 3 weapon hold) 
  • Reload

 Work in progresse : 

  • Reload Animation 
  • Player feed back (Shot and muzzle flash)
  • IK for feet and hands
  • HUD
